home.name: Yoquelvis Jorge Abreu
home.description: A passionate Software Developer dedicated to creating innovative and efficient solutions.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Hello! I'm Yoquelvis Jorge Abreu, a passionate web developer with a love for creating beautiful and functional websites.
I specialize in front-end development, with expertise in React, JavaScript, HTML5, and modern CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS.
Additionally, I have experience with Node.js, allowing me to work on full-stack projects.
My skill set also includes Git for version control, SQL for database management, and Linux for server environments.
I am familiar with Python and Machine Learning, which expands my capabilities in data analysis and AI-driven projects.
Moreover, I have experience in Power BI for data visualization, and I'm knowledgeable in Microservices architecture for scalable applications.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying a good cup of coffee.

jobs.title: Web Development
jobs.description: I work on the creation and optimization of websites, using technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript, among other frameworks, focusing on user experience and the performance of web applications.

jobs.title: Intern, Technology/Management Systems
jobs.description: During my internship in Technology/Management Systems, I used Oracle SQL to manage enterprise data and created reports and analysis using tools such as Pentaho and BI Publisher, supporting decision making.

jobs.title: SQL Database Administrator
jobs.description: Administration and maintenance of SQL databases. Query optimization and database performance tuning. Management of backups and data recovery. Implementation of security procedures and access control.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: A showcase of my most significant and innovative projects

items.title: Barcode Generator
items.description: Desktop application with GUI for generating barcodes with unique ID and local SQLite database management. Features include user authentication, multiple barcode formats (Code128, EAN13, EAN8, Code39), ID card editor with customizable HTML templates, and automatic OCR verification.

items.title: Avatar Generator
items.description: AI-powered platform that allows users to generate random and unique avatars with customizable styles and options.

items.title: Jokes Generator
items.description: Fun application that generates improvised jokes and dark humor content with a simple and intuitive interface.

items.title: ScheduleHub
items.description: Web application for university students that allows organizing and visualizing academic schedules in an aesthetic and intuitive way. Features PDF upload with AI processing, interactive weekly calendar, customizable colors, and export functionality.
